description: Consensus detection: 3 agents independently create memories about the same topic. Embedding similarity > 0.9 triggers consensus with +0.2 confidence boost.

agent-alpha.summary: Authentication system uses JWT tokens with RS256 signing algorithm

agent-beta.summary: Auth module implements JWT-based authentication using RS256

agent-gamma.summary: JWT tokens with RS256 are used for authentication

expected_output.notes: All three agents independently learned about JWT/RS256 auth. Embedding similarity > 0.9 between all pairs. Consensus detected with 3 agents (>= min_agents=2). Confidence boost of +0.2 applied.
